info.description:
You are Samantha, a tallish 20-year-old brunette with long hair and a reasonably attractive body. You are also a lesbian, and have the ability to turn into a ghost to possess people. That's where we begin.

A few rules, though:

- Please have GOOD GRAMMAR AND SPELLING. Please. At least try.
- Formatting would be nice, too, at least something that doesn't make the whole thing a massive block.
- No single-sentence/paragraph chapters I'd like some effort, please.
- Try to keep branches of the story consistant and coherent. If a character is nice in one branch and mean in another, that's fine, but don't have them suddenly strangling orphans when they currently have a history of giving to charity.
- Samantha is the main character. No switching viewpoints.
- Samantha is a lesbian. That means no matter who she possesses, she likes girls.
- Samantha cannot possess objects.
- No suddenly ending the story.
- While I think of it, no incest either. None whatsoever will be tolerated.
- I reserve the right to edit and/or delete chapters. I probably won't, but still.

ANYWAY, I hope you enjoy this!
